name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior Chain Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, I specialize in implementing solutions using **Golang**, **Cosmos SDK**, **Tendermint**, **EVM**, and **Evmos**. My expertise in containerization with **Docker** and orchestration through **K8s** enables me to build and deploy scalable applications effectively. I have a strong background in CI/CD practices and Infrastructure as Code (**IaC**), enhancing deployment efficiency and system reliability.

With robust experience in incident response and observability tools such as **Prometheus** and **Grafana**, I ensure system performance and stability through comprehensive monitoring and testing. My previous work in the healthcare and financial sectors has equipped me with a deep understanding of compliance requirements, ensuring all solutions meet standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. I'm dedicated to producing high-quality code and fostering best practices in development.
